sourcesContent:
import {formatISO9075} from "date-fns"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Post({title,summary,content,cover,createdAt,author}){ return (<>
//link so user should be able to click on image & title

{title}

{author.username} {formatISO9075(new Date(createdAt))}

{summary}

); }
